PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-02752022-03-25,  ,  ,  PS,  , 
ActEmergency Management Act
SubjectProvincial Emergency Financial Assistance Order No. 239, British Columbia
PrecisOrder authorizing the PROVINCIAL EMERGENCY FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ORDER No. 239 in order to (1) declare federal concern and (2) authorize the Minister of Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness to provide financial assistance to BRITISH COLUMBIA with respect to the interface fires that occurred in British Columbia from April 18, 2021 to September 14, 2021.
AttachmentsAttachment
